lead_paragraph: LAUFER--Harry. The Board of Governors and the members of The Seawane Club, record with profound sorrow the passing of our beloved longtime member, Harry Laufer. We extend heartfelt sympathy to his wife Joan and the entire Laufer family. Jeffrey Greenfield, President 1/3
snippet: LAUFER--Harry. The Board of Governors and the members of The Seawane Club, record with profound sorrow the passing of our beloved longtime member, Harry Laufer. We extend heartfelt sympathy to his wife Joan and the entire Laufer family. Jeffrey Greenfield, President 1/3
